values:
<center><big><big>Who wants to party?</big>

Or be friends.</big>

hxcginger
Ask me a question, anything you want, and I'll answer it.You can post anonymous, or not. And you can ask as many questions you want

Step 1: Put your MP3 player or whatever on random. Step 2: Post the first line from the first 20 songs that play, no matter how embarrassing the song. Step 3: Post and let everyone you know guess what song and artist the lines come from. Step 4: Strike out the songs when someone guesses correctly 1: Take a bow, pack on powder Talk Shows on Mute, Incubus 2: Warn your warmth to turn away Love Like Winter, AFI 3: I hurt myself today, to see if I still feel 4: No one can blame you for walking away 5: I'm on fire and now I think I'm ready to bust a move 6: Here's a middle finger coming straight from oca-l-a 7: The glove compartment is inaccurately named 8: Some of us are born and then some of us are born again 9: If she wants to dance and drink all night then 10: Oh lord, wont you buy me a mercedes benz 11: Disarm you with a smile and cut you like you want me to 12: I know that it is freezing, but I think we have to walk 13: Give me one reason to stay here 14: This silence kills the calm of the night 15: It's you that I adore you'll always be my whore Ava Adore, Smashing Pumpkins 16: Didn't I make you feel like you were the only man 17: No matter what the people say I can't, I cant let go 18: Nobody on the road, nobody on the beach The Boys of Summer, Don Henley 19: We'll do it all, everything, on our own Chasing Cars, Snow Patrol 20: Busted flat in Baton Rouge, waitin' fer a train

<center>So...
life is better,
I'm pretty sure Danny loves us again.
But I feel like shit,
Mikael has a cold,
so Rhys probably has one too.
Mikael has been fussing up a storm.
Maybe I'm just a horrible mommy,
but it's running me ragged.
In better news I've lost 10 pounds and counting.

<center><i><b>Ask me a question, anything you want, and I'll answer it.
You can post anonymous, or not.
You can ask as many questions you want
